meanings.definition: A breed of domestic cat known for its distinctive appearance and playful nature.
meanings.sent1: The cheshires in the neighborhood love to chase after yarn.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of cheshires playing with a ball of string in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cheshires decided to have a race to see who could catch the toy mouse first.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with cheshires of all colors, each with their own unique markings.
meanings.sent5: The cheshires' purring could be heard throughout the house, bringing a sense of comfort.

meanings.definition: A type of cheese originating from the English county of Cheshire.
meanings.sent1: The sandwich was made with a slice of delicious cheshires.
meanings.sent2: The market had a special offer on cheshires, so I bought some to try.
meanings.sent3: She made a cheesy joke about cheshires being the happiest cheese in the world.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cheshires filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of cheshires melted in my mouth, leaving a rich flavor behind.
